(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB probably))
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the)
              (ADJP (RBS most) (RB well) (VBN established))
              (NNP Ipoh) (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (NNP Singapore)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(one-4, This-1)
cop(one-4, is-2)
advmod(one-4, probably-3)
root(ROOT-0, one-4)
prep(one-4, of-5)
det(Fun-12, the-6)
advmod(established-9, most-7)
advmod(established-9, well-8)
amod(Fun-12, established-9)
nn(Fun-12, Ipoh-10)
nn(Fun-12, Hor-11)
pobj(of-5, Fun-12)
prep(Fun-12, in-13)
pobj(in-13, Singapore-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Mr) (NNP Lee) (NNP Tong) (NNP Kee))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD started)
        (S
          (VP (VBG selling)
            (NP (PRP$ his) (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (CD 1948)))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (NNP KL))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB then))
        (VBD opened)
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Tanjong) (NNP Pagar))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (CD 1969)))))))
    (. .)))

nn(Kee-4, Lee-2)
nn(Kee-4, Tong-3)

poss(Fun-9, his-7)

dobj(selling-6, Fun-9)
prep(selling-6, in-10)
pobj(in-10, 1948-11)

pobj(in-12, KL-13)

dobj(opened-16, one-17)

    (NP (PRP It))

          (WHNP (WDT that))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ serves)
              (NP
                (NP (NNP Ipoh) (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun))
                (PP (IN as)
                  (NP (PRP$ their) (NN signature) (NN dish)))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (SINV
    (S
      (SBAR
        (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
          (NP
            (NP
              (NP (NN I) (RB am))
              (ADJP (RB not) (JJ aware)))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (DT any) (NNS others))))
          (-RRB- -RRB-))
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP think)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJ key) (NN characteristic))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT a) (JJ great)))))))
      (VP (VBP Ipoh)
        (NP (NNP Hor) (NNP Fun))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN texture))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (NNP Hor)))))
    (NP (NNP Fun))))
